mapper.select: select personId from acg_person where personId = #{personId}

select acg_person.personId, acg_person.name, acg_person.nameCn, acg_person.image, acg_person.height, acg_person.weight, acg_person.alias, acg_person.type, acg_person.gender, acg_person.bloodtype, acg_person.birthday, acg_person_detail.summary from acg_person INNER JOIN acg_person_detail ON acg_person.personId = acg_person_detail.personId AND acg_person_detail.personId = #{personId} AND acg_person_detail.summary IS NOT NULL
